app-description: Propty is a property management system that helps you manage your properties efficiently.
contact: For support, please contact us at support@propty.com

onboarding.select-user-type: Select the option that best fits what you're here to do.

looking-to-buy-or-rent.title: I'm looking to $t(buy) or $t(rent)?
looking-to-buy-or-rent.description: Browse listings, contact owners, and find your next space.

property-to-list.title: I have a property to list.
property-to-list.description: Post listings, track interest, and connect with buyers or renters.
